item.title: Blender - Hard Ops
item.description: Hard Ops official docs Shortcuts Hops Menu : Q Bevel Helper : Ctrl Shift B Object Mode Operations Operations Smart Apply LMB : Smart apply modifiers (kkeps last bevel and weighted normal) Shift LMB Smart apply duplicate (With clear last bevel and weighted normal) Edit Mode Curve/Extract Curve/Extract LMB : Converts edge to curve. Shift LMB : Converts selection to plate.
